description: Enter free transform mode to scale, rotate, and move the layer or selection.

userMessage.success: Free Transform mode activated. Adjust the transform and press Enter to confirm.
userMessage.error: Unable to enter Free Transform mode. Ensure a document is open and there is content to transform.

description: Scale the current layer or selection by specified percentage.

userMessage.error: Unable to scale. Ensure a document is open and there is content to scale.

params.paramDescription: Horizontal scale percentage from 1 to 1000. Default is 100.
Vertical scale percentage from 1 to 1000. Default is 100.
Maintain aspect ratio when scaling. Default is true.
Anchor point for scaling. Possible values: TOPLEFT, TOPCENTER, TOPRIGHT, MIDDLELEFT, MIDDLECENTER, MIDDLERIGHT, BOTTOMLEFT, BOTTOMCENTER, BOTTOMRIGHT. Default is MIDDLECENTER.

description: Rotate the current layer or selection by specified angle.

userMessage.error: Unable to rotate. Ensure a document is open and there is content to rotate.

params.paramDescription: Rotation angle in degrees. Positive values rotate clockwise. Default is 0.
Anchor point for rotation. Possible values: TOPLEFT, TOPCENTER, TOPRIGHT, MIDDLELEFT, MIDDLECENTER, MIDDLERIGHT, BOTTOMLEFT, BOTTOMCENTER, BOTTOMRIGHT. Default is MIDDLECENTER.

description: Rotate the current layer 90 degrees clockwise.

userMessage.error: Unable to rotate. Ensure a document is open and there is content to rotate.

description: Rotate the current layer 90 degrees counter-clockwise.

userMessage.error: Unable to rotate. Ensure a document is open and there is content to rotate.

description: Rotate the current layer 180 degrees.

userMessage.error: Unable to rotate. Ensure a document is open and there is content to rotate.

description: Flip the current layer horizontally (mirror).

userMessage.error: Unable to flip. Ensure a document is open and there is content to flip.

description: Flip the current layer vertically.

userMessage.error: Unable to flip. Ensure a document is open and there is content to flip.

description: Skew the current layer along horizontal or vertical axis.

userMessage.error: Unable to skew. Ensure a document is open and there is content to skew.

params.paramDescription: Horizontal skew angle in degrees from -45 to 45. Default is 0.
Vertical skew angle in degrees from -45 to 45. Default is 0.

description: Enter distort mode to freely move corners independently.

userMessage.success: Distort mode activated. Drag corners to distort and press Enter to confirm.
userMessage.error: Unable to enter Distort mode. Ensure a document is open and there is content to distort.

description: Enter perspective transform mode to add perspective to the layer.

userMessage.success: Perspective mode activated. Drag corners to adjust perspective and press Enter to confirm.
userMessage.error: Unable to enter Perspective mode. Ensure a document is open and there is content to transform.

description: Enter warp mode to bend and reshape the layer using a mesh grid.

userMessage.success: Warp mode activated. Drag mesh points to warp and press Enter to confirm.
userMessage.error: Unable to enter Warp mode. Ensure a document is open and there is content to warp.

params.paramDescription: Preset warp style. Possible values: NONE, ARC, ARC_LOWER, ARC_UPPER, ARCH, BULGE, SHELL_LOWER, SHELL_UPPER, FLAG, WAVE, FISH, RISE, FISHEYE, INFLATE, SQUEEZE, TWIST. Default is NONE.
Bend amount for preset styles from -100 to 100. Default is 50.
Horizontal distortion from -100 to 100. Default is 0.
Vertical distortion from -100 to 100. Default is 0.

description: Scale the layer while protecting important content using content-aware algorithms.

userMessage.success: Content-Aware Scale mode activated. Resize while protecting important areas and press Enter to confirm.
userMessage.error: Unable to enter Content-Aware Scale mode. Ensure a document is open and there is content to scale.

params.paramDescription: Automatically protect skin tones during scaling. Default is false.

description: Enter Puppet Warp mode to add pins and move parts of the image independently.

userMessage.success: Puppet Warp mode activated. Add pins and drag to warp, then press Enter to confirm.
userMessage.error: Unable to enter Puppet Warp mode. Ensure a document is open and there is content to warp.

params.paramDescription: Mesh flexibility. Possible values: RIGID, NORMAL, DISTORT. Default is NORMAL.
Mesh density. Possible values: FEWER_POINTS, NORMAL, MORE_POINTS. Default is NORMAL.
How far mesh extends beyond layer bounds in pixels from 0 to 100. Default is 2.

description: Move the current layer to a new position.

userMessage.error: Unable to move layer. Ensure a document is open and there is content to move.

params.paramDescription: New X position in pixels. Positive values move right, negative move left.
New Y position in pixels. Positive values move down, negative move up.
If true, x and y are relative to current position. If false, they are absolute coordinates. Default is true.
